location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mr Henry Willock at Tabriz to the Political Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Henry Willock, the British envoy to Persia, informs the British Political Resident that he is preparing a report for the British Government, about increased foreign trade in the Persian Gulf in recent years. Henry Willock asks the British Political Resident to provide him with any relevant information, including the following statistics: (a) the type and quantity of British and Indian exports to Persia that are landed at the ports of the Persian Gulf, (b) the number of British and Arab ships engaged in trade in the Persian Gulf, particularly with India.
